TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Matrix extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示用于在二维空间中进行转换的 3x3 仿射转换矩阵。

span.span: Represents a 3x3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in 2-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 3x3 矩阵用于进行中的转换[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)]x-y 平面。A 3x3 matrix is used for transformations in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_2d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y plane. 仿射转换矩阵相乘以形成任意数量的线性转换，如旋转和倾斜 （切变），然后再进行平移。Affine transformation matrices can be multiplied to form any number of linear transformations, such as rotation and skew (shear), followed by translation. 仿射转换矩阵具有等于 （0，0，1），因此只需指定前两个列中的成员的最后一列。An affine transformation matrix has its final column equal to (0, 0, 1), so only the members in the first two columns need to be specified. 请注意矢量表示为行矢量，而非列矢量。Note that vectors are expressed as row-vectors, not column vectors. 一个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用行优先顺序存储，具有以下结构：A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is stored using row-major order and has the following structure: |||| |-|-|-| |||00| |||00| |||11| 最后一行中的成员和，表示平移值。The members in the last row, and , represent translation values. 在方法和属性中，转换矩阵通常被指定为仅六个成员与一个向量，如下所示：In methods and properties, the transformation matrix is usually specified as a vector with only six members, as follows: (, , , , , )(, , , , , ) 尽管可以使用结构直接将单独的点，或使用对象，转换[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]还提供了一组类，您可以将对象转换而无需直接使用矩阵：， ， ，和。Although you can use a structure directly to translate individual points, or with a to transform objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] also provides a set of classes that enable you to transform objects without working directly with matrices: , , , and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 将指定的 结构追加到此 结构。

span.span: Appends the specified structure to this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作等同于乘以此参数的结构`matrix`。This operation is the same as multiplying this structure by the parameter `matrix`. 矩阵相乘不是可交换性，不过，因此此操作不是与相乘参数相同`matrix`由此结构; 也就是说，(这 * `matrix`) 不是与相同 (`matrix` * 这)。Matrix multiplication is not commutative, though, so this operation is not the same as multiplying the parameter `matrix` by this structure; that is, (this * `matrix`) is not the same as (`matrix` * this). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将追加到另一个结构结构。The following example shows how to append a structure to another structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixRotateAboutPointExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixrotateaboutpointexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 一个将其值存储为双精度型值。A stores its values as doubles. 因为的值它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。Because the value of a can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two structures that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查两个结构是否相等。The following example shows how to check two structures for equality. summary.span: 获取一个恒等 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某标识矩阵在系数 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3] 的值为 1 和 0 在其余系数的值。An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients. 这与设置相关联并为 1 并， ， ，并为 0。This correlates to setting and to 1 and , , , and to 0. 在仿射矩阵，这是实现的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用于，结构，系数 [3，1]，[3，2] 和 [3.3] 暗指始终分别具有 0,0,1 的值。In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the , structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively. |||| |-|-|-| |11|00|00| |00|11|00| |00|00|11| 恒等矩阵，对于方法将返回字符串"标识"而不是这些系数的。For an identity matrix, the method returns the string "Identity" instead of the coefficients of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索矩阵。The following example shows how to retrieve the matrix. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixIdentityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixidentityexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 一个将其值存储为双精度型值。A stores its values as doubles. 因为的值它，比较两个执行算术运算时可能会丢失精度逻辑上相等的结构可能会失败。Because the value of a can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on it, a comparison between two structures that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查两个结构是否相等。The following example shows how to check two structures for equality. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作是与相乘参数相同`matrix`由此结构。This operation is the same as multiplying the parameter `matrix` by this structure. 矩阵相乘不是可交换性，但是，因此此操作不是与让这参数的结构`matrix`; 即`matrix`* 这是不与此相同 * `matrix`。Matrix multiplication is not commutative, however, so this operation is not the same as multiplying this structure by the parameter `matrix`; that is, `matrix` * this is not the same as this * `matrix`. 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在前面添加到另一种。The following example shows how to prepend a onto another . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在前面添加旋转到。The following example shows how to prepend a rotation to a . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependRotateExamples_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependrotateexamples_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在前面添加到。The following example shows how to prepend a scale to a . [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixPrependScaleExamples_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixprependscaleexamples_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在前面添加到结构。The following example shows how to prepend a scale to a structure. summary.span: 将此 结构更改为恒等矩阵。

span.span: Changes this structure into an identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某标识矩阵在系数 [1，1]，[2，2] [3，3] 的值为 1 和 0 在其余系数的值。An identity matrix has a value of 1 in coefficients [1,1],[2,2],[3,3] and a value of 0 in the rest of the coefficients. 这与设置相关联并为 1 并， ， ，并为 0。This correlates to setting and to 1 and , , , and to 0. 在仿射矩阵，这是实现的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]用于结构，系数 [3，1]，[3，2] 和 [3.3] 暗指始终分别具有 0,0,1 的值。In an affine matrix, which is the implementation that [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] uses for the structure, coefficients [3,1],[3,2],[3.3] are implied to always have the values 0,0,1 respectively. |||| |-|-|-| |11|00|00| |00|11|00| |00|00|11| 恒等矩阵，对于方法将返回字符串"标识"，而不是这些系数的。For an identity matrix, the method returns the string "Identity", instead of the coefficients of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将为恒等矩阵的结构。The following example shows how to turn a structure into an identity matrix. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixIdentityExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixidentityexample_csharp)]

summary.span: 在此 结构前面添加 x 和 y 维中指定角度的扭曲。

span.span: Prepends a skew of the specified degrees in the x and y dimensions to this structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 此示例演示如何在前面附加到扭曲结构。This example shows how to prepend a skew to a structure. [!code-csharp[MatrixExamples_snip#MatrixSkewPrependExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixExamples_snip/CSharp/MatrixExample.cs#matrixskewprependexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复合转换中，各个转换的顺序非常重要。In a composite transformation, the order of individual transformations is important. 例如，如果首先旋转，然后扩展，然后转换，您获得不同的结果不是如果首先将旋转，则缩放。For example, if you first rotate, then scale, then translate, you get a different result than if you first translate, then rotate, then scale. 顺序很重要的原因之一是，这样针对的坐标系的原点的像旋转和缩放的变换。One reason order is significant is that transformations like rotation and scaling are done with respect to the origin of the coordinate system. 缩放以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果已离开源的对象与缩放。Scaling an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than scaling an object that has been moved away from the origin. 同样，旋转以原点为中心的对象生成不同的结果比旋转对象已移动背离原点。Similarly, rotating an object that is centered at the origin produces a different result than rotating an object that has been moved away from the origin. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何前面预置到转换结构。The following example shows how prepend a translation onto a structure.
